text: The Bigelow Tea Company (formerly R.C. Bigelow, Inc.) is an American company that sells dried teas based in Fairfield, Connecticut. It was founded by Ruth C. Bigelow in 1945. The company markets over 50 types of tea, including black, green, and herbal. It is still a 100% family-owned business."Hoovers article on R.C. Bigelow, Inc.". Accessed in 2010. It lists David Bigelow and Eunice Bigelow as Co-Chairmen and Co-CEO's, and Cynthia Bigelow as President. Bigelow employs 350 people. ==References== Category:1945 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Connecticut Category:Fairfield, Connecticut Category:Tea Category:American drink companies
title: Bigelow Tea Company
